entry.def: If you water-ski, you stand on skis in the water while being pulled along by a boat.

example.ex: The staff will be happy to help arrange for you to swim, sail, or water-ski.
example.tran: 工作人员会很乐意为您安排游泳、航行或是滑水等活动。

means.word_mean: 1. skiing on water while being towed by a motorboat
